name: Ultimate Dinosaur Simulator 2016- Deadly Jurassic Rampage Assault Challenge
name_original: Ultimate Dinosaur Simulator 2016- Deadly Jurassic Rampage Assault Challenge
description:
Try Dinosaur Simulator Ultimate 3D game
Have you ever wanted to see the world through the eyes of a Dinosaur? Now you finally have a chance to know that feeling…!
Dinosaur Simulator Ultimate 3D game is full of anger and blaze of the angry swamp Dinosaur. Use your animal instinct and attack wild animals with vicious power and rage. Take control of most wild predators reptile swamp monster, all animals in forest are scared from the bloodthirsty hungry eyes, sharp teeth, deadly roar of the wildlife simulator alligator rampage. Download this Dinosaur Simulator and attack on wild animals. Be a part of epic battle between survival of the fittest in animal simulators. Survive against wildlife reptiles in this ultimate Dinosaur Simulator.
In Dinosaur Simulator Ultimate 3D you play as a huge Dinosaur predator and learn the fun of devouring your prey. With an appetite as big as the size of this water beast, you can hunt and eat anything. See the world as an angry monster that will attack anything it sets its bulging eyes on. Control this giant in water and on land.
You had played goat, snake, lion, horse, humpback whales, wolf simulator now try your hands on controlling angry wildlife Dinosaur simulator 3d.
Dinosaur is deadliest hunters they eats people hunts down them in this realistic simulator.

Features of Dinosaur Simulator Ultimate 3D
• Time Mode
• Inspiring Environment
• Amazing Graphics (GUI)
• Appealing Sound Effects
• Huge animated 3D Dinosaur .
• Smooth and easy controls to make the Dinosaur move and attack.
• Fast and action packed gameplay.
• 10 awesome levels.
